inclusion.criterion: benign biliary stricture caused by chronic pancreatitis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: abdominal CT scan revealed acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis

exclusion.criterion: acute/chronic hepatitis or abnormal hepatic imaging
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: lab studies are remarkable for leukocytosis (19.5), urea of 8.5, high CRP (145)

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: The patient is a 41-year-old obese woman coming to the emergency room with abdominal pain and vomiting

notes: Patient has gall stone pancreatitis, no history of allergies or smoking. Family history positive for hypertension.
